articles.content:
Professor Linda Bauld, public health researcher at the University of Edinburgh
Britain probably won't suffer a third wave of Covid like the one tearing through Europe right now, a top public health … [+6840 chars]
articles.description: Professor Linda Bauld, from the University of Edinburgh, said Britain is 'in a very different position' because of its successful vaccine rollout and long second lockdown which got it through the winter.
articles.title: Britain WON'T suffer devastating third wave of Covid gripping Europe, public health expert says - Daily Mail

articles.author: Alwyn Scott
articles.content: NEW YORK (Reuters) - Asian markets were set to open higher on Friday in a holiday-lightened trading session, riding a surge of strong factory data and falling bold yields that pushed U.S. and Europea… [+2452 chars]
articles.description: Asian markets were set to open higher on Friday in a holiday-lightened trading session, riding a surge of strong factory data and falling bold yields that pushed U.S. and European benchmark stock indexes to record highs.
articles.title: Asia set to follow U.S. stocks higher as dollar, bond yields ease - Reuters
